title: An American Odyssey
description: Six men try to delay the onset of mid life crisis by completing the road trip of a lifetime and covering four thousand miles in the process, each in the saddle of a big Harley Davidson.Sounds easy, but some of them have not ridden a bike for twenty years or more.This is the story of the journey, day by day and covering the USA Coast to Coast, written in the authorâ€™s own individual style.
author: Mike Lisney
